description: Head straight along the street, keeping the bike lane on your left. The destination, Droguería San Ignacio, will be on the left side, marked by a prominent green sign just before a building with a tiled roof.
agent_concise_description: Head straight along the street, keeping the bike lane on your left. The destination, Droguería San Ignacio, will be on the left side, marked by a prominent green sign just before a building with a tiled roof.
